data.text: Khawajarra, nangni'n kathamak karil, maleisei karil, emakli katha inleem, kara-ot, emakli mikarilse chong kathamak rakip hi mathaanru.
Khat-um inneilim naitedoong ngai ang inlang apharakip ah inthiang ranutui kha rathalam sik-ah karaalchak eru, khawakha e-inchu nangni'n sanminringna ah ning insoonsik eii.
Atuunchu nangni'n Pumi hi angtuk kathame tihi ningjetjei. Minpkla 34:8
Mi ngai'n innahiaijuon anemna kaboi karing lungpui nangni kha Pumi diang ningheiwa inchu, Pathian in nangni hi kalurtheiya i-nakadang mi ning-ejei.

Nangni'n karing lungpui angnga heiwaru, halli nangni kha rathalamtiang biak-inn saknasik ah na-inliingnasik eii, khawa khan nangni hi Jisu Christa makheiya Pathian izoot rathalamtiang dooiphur ngai kapesik ah inthiang thiampu ngai angnga sepa kathosik ning-eii.
Ajarchu Pathian chong in ati,
Han hiwa lung kangamna nangni kha aman katamthei ning eii, takkha aka-ngamnamak inmani diangchu,
Khat-um aleiilaak inthiang chong in ati,

Takkha nangnichu innakadang mi ngaikha ning ejei, rengphung sik, inthiang zaatsik, Pathian misik, khat-um nangni ngaikha kaziing makheiya ama katha war khan anakoisuok jarra nangni'n Pathian chuontho loknakha karilthang sik-ah inakadang eii. Suok 19:5-6; Isa 9:2; 43:20,21; Innidan 4:20; 7:6; Tit 2:14
Apha khatchu nangni Pathian mi ngai lei-emakchu, atuunchu Pathian mi ning ejei, halli apha khatchu Pathian minriangna kha leimumakchu, takkha atuunchu ama minriangna kha ningmujei. Hos 2:23
Minriang kaom ulenai ngai, kei'n nangnidiang kanati, khuolmi khat-um innlei kaboi angnga hiwa manmasituol hin! eini taksa ah raal kanatho manu chuonhi katho emui.
Nangni ngai rakip chuonna kathamak ah kanarilla kaom Pathian kajetmak zaatlop ngaidiang katha omchanna ringru, ajarchu ama juoni nichuontho katha li Pathian niminpaakna ngaihi inmani'n murasu.
Khale inruoiya Pumi sikbeiya ranak kanei mirakip diang e-innum, matorna kaneikhet reng diang e-innum,
halli ramkaroon ngaidiang e-innum nangnikha inpeluutru, ajarchu inmani kha kathamak katho ngaidiang poongna kapesik khat-um katha katho ngaidiang kaminpaak sik-ah Pathian in ikadang eii.
Khawajarra kajetmak ngai'n ka-am chongril kha nangni'n katha tho-inlang min-omchianru, khawakha Pathian inmanuom kha eii.
Ninglungdouwa karing mi eru, khat-um nangni lungdou kha kathamak makhu nasik ah inliingna maru. Takkha Pathian suok ang inlang ringru.
Mi rakip kha kayaru, inngamna kanei aleiilaak diang minriangru, Pathian kha kayaru, khat-um reng ngaikha um kayaru.
Suok rakip in ning karu ngaikha kayaru, khat-um nangni ngaidiang katha kanatho inmani khabit emak ning kayasik khat-um akathamak karu diang um ning kayasik eii.
Nangni'n ngamnasik kaommak poongna kha ning intongpui inchu Pathian in rawaan napesik eii, ajarchu nangni'n Pathian lungdou sik-ah ning-ngaidon.
Halli nangni'n kathamak natho jarra ramol nabak inchu angme nanemna kaom, takkha nangni'n kadik ningtholi poongna ningnei inchu Pathian in nangni kha rawaan napesik eii.
Hiwasik-ah Pathian in nangni kha inakoisuok eii, ajarchu Christa in napoong piya omchan kathakha naleidapi, khawajarra ningni'n ama omchan kha ningjuisik eii.
Halli ama'n manu thomak, khat-um ama baisuo makheiya maleisei inkhatbit um iril jetmakmi. Isa 53:9
Amakha inrilthai kaalkhan, ama'n kase ah masang kirnookmak, ama kha inminpoong kaalkhan, woikhat maleiikirsik thomak, takkha akadik chongtan nikhan Pathian om tia ama inngamna kha ada. Isa 53:7
Khale inruoiya Christa Jisu apumtak in eini manu rakip cross ah anaroonpi, khawajarra eini'n manu khan thimator nite halli akadiksik um ringmator nite. Ama napoppi nakhan eini nidamjei. Isa 53:5
Khawajarra nangni'n keelngam inkhat in alam iminchai ka-ang ning eii, takkha atuunchu nangni ngai ratha kanakhaalpi keelngam kakhaalpa diang ning heikirjei. Isa 53:6
